content.html: There's something about Mastodon that has this old-timey internet feel to it, if that makes sense. It reminds me of joining an a forum or community online in the late '90s or early 2000s where you really had to learn the mores and personality of the place.
content.value:
There's something about Mastodon that has this old-timey internet feel to it, if that makes sense.

It reminds me of joining an a forum or community online in the late '90s or early 2000s where you really had to learn the mores and personality of the place.
